I agree with the post office, cover up or leave. Her baby is 3 weeks old, she knows what kind of schedule he is on and should have waited a few minutes before going to the post office. I am not against breast feeding, but there is nothing worse than seeing a woman pop out a breast in the public with no cover and feed her baby. I don't have a problem if they cover themselves in public. Why is it all of a sudden ok for woman not to cover themselves. You read stories every day like this and none of it would have happened it they had, had the common sense to cover themselves.

This reminds me of God's command in the Qur'an, to protect the she-camel, to allow it to roam freely and feed itself. But, evildoers disobeyed God and His Prophet (pbuh), and slaughtered the she-camel - so He punished them severely. We all have a part to play in conserving our environment, and preserving the precious creatures of God. Well done Iran, keep up the great work!
